episodes.title: TWIN FLAME UNIVERSE CULT: The Dark & Layered Deception
episodes.description:
Join Brice from Esoteric Atlanta, Steve, and myself, Doug Kramer (DbNC), as we delve into the intricate layers of the Twin Flame Universe cult, led by founders Jeff and Shaleia. We discuss and attempt to dissect the many deceptive aspects to the grift, shedding light on its darker elements. 


TwinFlameUniverse #CultExposure #DeceptivePractices

episodes.title: How Narcissistic Relationships MIRROR Cults - Part 4: ESCAPE & HEALING | HG Tudor
episodes.description:
This is the final part in a multi-part podcast series with HG Tudor designed to break down and explain how narcissistic relationships mirror cult dynamics, and vice-versa. We use my own cult experience and family background to set the stage for said exploration, starting from the initial stages of ensnarement, to capture/full immersion, through to the extraction/escape/healing process. This short series aims to offer insight for practical solutions as well as how to protect yourself from similar situations.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=igYqoJjKseY&t=969s

♦ Link to Part 2 (Capture & Immersion):
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DXL6XYzt4Ig

episodes.title: SCIENTOLOGY - Truth Revealed | S2 Ep.8
episodes.description:
After escaping the Scientology Mission Staff contract, I head back to Hollywood to continue pursuing my dreams in the acting profession. In this episode we discuss Scientology's Celebrity Center, the Freewinds, their various front groups that I worked with, and the secret truth behind the bogus state of Clear.

episodes.title: How Narcissistic Relationships MIRROR Cults - Part 1: SEDUCTION | HG Tudor
episodes.description:
This is part 1 in a 3-part podcast series with HG Tudor designed to break down and explain how narcissistic relationships mirror cult dynamics, and vice-versa. We use my own cult experience and family background to set the stage for said exploration, starting from the initial stages of ensnarement, to full immersion, through to the extraction/escape/healing process. This short series aims to offer insight for practical solutions as well as how to protect yourself from similar situations. Part 2 to follow in a few weeks.
